LanguageData.ArachnaeFighter_Swarm_Claws_Part.label: Warrior Strain Scythe Limbs
LanguageData.ArachnaeFighter_Swarm_Claws_Part.descrip: Auxiliary limbs created from the genes of the Arachnae Warrior Strain. The colonist can wield them like a weapon and use them against approaching enemies.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Myrmecocystus_Tail_Par: A tail created from the genes of the Arachnae Honey Pot Strain. Numerous auxiliary organs severely affect the colonist's original physiological system, but in exchange, the ability to produce Arachnae insect jelly is gained. The modified colonist produces 5 units of Arachnae insect jelly per day.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Skyraider_Wings_Part.d: Wings created from the genes of the Arachnae Skyraider Strain. They are not suitable for the colonist's physique, so constant flight is impossible, but short periods of hovering are possible.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Smokepop_Armor_Part.de: Heavy armor carapace created from the genes of the Arachnae Smokepop Strain, forming over the shoulders and upper body. It provides solid defense but significantly reduces movement speed.
Head carapace created from the genes of the Arachnae Shield Head Strain. It provides a degree of defense and also secretes chitin. The modified colonist produces 10 Chitin per day.
